product_name: REI Lightweight Polartec Power Dry Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's Tall
long_description: The REI Lightweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) long underwear bottoms for tall men let you layer with confidence; they're light enough for aerobic activity yet fit smoothly under other pieces. Polartec Power Dry utilizes 2 different yarns on either side of the fabric to enhance comfort: interior yarn wicks moisture, and exterior yarn dries quickly. The combination of the 2 yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin faster than single-component fabrics such as cotton. Updated fabric protects skin against harmful ultraviolet light with a UPF rating of 20, and is very soft to the touch. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Brushed elastic waistband ensures a comfortable fit outing after outing. Functional fly. The men's tall REI Lightweight Polartec Power Dry long underwear bottoms feature a next-to-skin fit that hugs the body and boosts fabric performance.
